page.title: 21Authors
page.content: Sure I wrote this with my best friend (and later best man) Neil Brooks when we were in Mr Kerr's class at St. Martins School, Worle, Weston-super-Mare. Always wondered what had happened to our entry on Worlebury Hill. Remember having lots of fun writing and re-writing it (earlier versions were rather funny - to an 8-year old anyway!). Good to see the whole project on line.
